mod.description: Lets you pan the camera around.
IllFormatedConfig: Config file seems ill-formated, using default. Please use Generic Mod Config Menu to configure.
Keybind.title: Keybinds
Keybind.description: The keybinds used to control the camera.
Boundaries.title: Boundaries
Camera.title: Camera
ToggleBehavior.title: Toggle Behavior
ToggleBehavior.description: Controls what toggles the camera panning. Options: Never = no panning. Always = panning always allowed. Camera = hold the camera object to pan. Toggle = uses a hotkey to toggle.
ResetWhenDamageTaken.title: Reset When Damage Taken
ResetWhenDamageTaken.description: Resets the camera after damage is taken.
Speed.title: Speed
Speed.description: How fast should the camera move?
XRange.title: X Range
XRange.description: The distance the viewport can get away from the player, on the X axis.
YRange.title: Y Range
YRange.description: The distance the viewport can get away from the player, on the Y axis.
UseMouseToPan.title: Use Mouse To Pan
UseMouseToPan.description: If enabled, moving the mouse to the edges of the screen will pan the camera.
ClickAndDragBehavior.title: Click And Drag Behavior
ClickAndDragBehavior.description: Controls how click-and-drag works. (see also the Click To Scroll keybind). Off = disabled. Drag Map = click to drag. AutoScroll = Mozilla-style.
ClickAndDragColor.title: Click And Drag Color
ClickAndDragColor.description: Sets the color of the little arrows that appear when the AutoScroll setting of Click And Drag behavior is enabled.
KeepPlayerOnScreen.title: Keep Player On Screen
KeepPlayerOnScreen.description: If enabled, the camera will avoid panning too far, to keep the player character on-screen.
ShowArrowsToOtherPlayers.title: Show Arrows To Other Players
ShowArrowsToOtherPlayers.description: If enabled, arrows will point out other players on the same map
SelfColor.title: Self Color
SelfColor.description: The color of the arrow pointing out the current player
FriendColor.title: Friend Color
FriendColor.description: The color of the arrow pointing out friends.
ToggleButton.title: Toggle Button
ToggleButton.description: The button used to toggle panning, if Toggle is enabled.
ResetButton.title: Reset Button
ResetButton.description: The button to use to reset the camera over the player.
ClickToScroll.title: Click To Scroll
UpButton.title: Up Button
UpButton.description: The button used to pan the camera upwards, if panning is enabled.
DownButton.title: Down Button
DownButton.description: The button used to pan the camera downwards, if panning is enabled.
LeftButton.title: Left Button
LeftButton.description: The button used to pan the camera leftwards, if panning is enabled.
RightButton.title: Right Button
RightButton.description: The button used to pan the camera rightwards, if panning is enabled.
IndoorsCameraBehavior.title: Indoors Camera Behavior
IndoorsCameraBehavior.description: Controls the default behavior of the camera in indoor spaces.
OutdoorsCameraBehavior.title: Outdoors Camera Behavior
OutdoorsCameraBehavior.description: Controls the default behavior of the camera in outdoor spaces
PerMapBehavior.title: Per-Map Configuration
PerMapBehavior.description: Allows you to fine-tune the behavior of this mod for each map.
disabled-settings-tooltip: Panning is disabled on this map in the settings
disabled-map-tooltip: Panning is disabled by this map.
forbidden: Panning is forbidden on this map.
disabled-somehow: Panning has been disabled on this map.
